alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Denton; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 6:15PM CDT until September 19 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Denton County in north central Texas... Northeastern Tarrant County in north central Texas... Northern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 615 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Coppell, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Arlington, Plano, Irving, Grand Prairie, Mesquite, Carrollton, Lewisville, Flower Mound, Euless, Bedford, Grapevine, Keller, Coppell, The Colony, Farmers Branch, Southlake, Balch Springs, University Park, and Colleyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
